https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/5tKNOPkle5weHfrobca4LnXJMD5.jpg Forced to give up his land and home, Texas rancher Red Bovie isn't about to retire quietly in a dismal trailer park. Instead he hops in his Cadillac and hits the road with his estranged grandson for one last wild adventure filled with guns, women and booze. Itâ€™s just another night in Old Mexico.
